title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create an environment configuration system:

1. Create a `Config` class that:
   - Loads variables from process.env
   - Validates required variables
   - Provides get() method with fallbacks
   - Masks secrets when displaying

2. Test with sample environment variables
instructions:
Create an environment configuration system:

1. Create a `Config` class that:
   - Loads variables from process.env
   - Validates required variables
   - Provides get() method with fallbacks
   - Masks secrets when displaying

2. Test with sample environment variables

hints.text: Use process.env to access environment variables

commonMistakes.consequence: Secrets are exposed in git history, even if deleted later (security breach).
commonMistakes.correction: Add .env to .gitignore before your first commit. Rotate any leaked secrets immediately.

commonMistakes.consequence: process.env variables are undefined, causing app crashes.
commonMistakes.correction: Import dotenv at the very top: import 'dotenv/config'; before other imports.
